type: Services d'entretien et de soutien des installations
short_summary: Facilities maintenance and support services to the Department of National Defence (DND) for installations located in CFS St. John’s and Outlying Areas, NL.  The Contractor will be required to provide maintenance and support services for all identified buildings and their associated infrastructure within the defined property limits in a manner and to a standard that will not cause the buildings to deteriorate beyond normal wear and tear throughout the Contract term.
description: Corpus of the autonomy Act contributes farm computes granted stewart touched town side
duration_in_months: : 3 years or 6 years (with option to extend)
